A

anyNonDefaultConstructor(JoinPoint) - Static method in class se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.aspect.ValidationAspect
Defines a Pointcut for any constructor to a class implementing Validatable.

P

performValidationAfterCompoundConstructor(JoinPoint, Validatable) - Method in class se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.aspect.ValidationAspect
Aspect invoking the Validatable.validateInternalState() method before returning from any non-default constructor within a class implementing Validatable.

V

ValidationAspect - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.aspect
The aspect enforcing validity on a class implementing Validatables (typically Entities or other classes containing state).
